name: Dissimilation
description: Dissimilation is a top down, retro styled shooter set in a randomly generated galaxy. Dock at space stations, land and explore planets, upgrade your ship and shoot your way across the stars.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 7 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: 1.2 GHz processor of faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 8 compatible graphics card with 512mb video memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 141 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 7 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: 1.4 GHz processor of faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 8 compatible graphics card with 512mb video memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 141 MB available space
